definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: Is similar to the overwhelming majority thunderbolt, the network becomes the first disseminator .
sentences.chinese: 如同絕大多數突發事件，網絡成爲最先傳播者。

sentences.english: Reducing the risk of mosquito transmission.
Tritium emits a weak form of radiation that does not travel very far in the air and cannot penetrate the skin.
sentences.chinese: 氚發出的輻射很弱，在空氣傳播不遠，不能穿透皮膚。

sentences.english: The latter release turned out to be the most popular among filesharers.
sentences.chinese: 而後者就是在文件共享者中傳播的最廣泛的一個版本。

sentences.english: In this aspect, the dissemination study present is all flowers blooms together, has not decided one.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，傳播學現在是百花齊放，沒有定於一尊。

sentences.english: He restored the traditional chanting and created more opportunities for monastics to propagate the Dharma by means of chanting.
sentences.chinese: 不但恢復傳統梵唄也同時培養了更多梵唄高僧來傳播。

sentences.english: His life was devoted to introducing and disseminating logical empiricism and scientific spirit.
sentences.chinese: 他的一生熱忱地介紹傳播邏輯經驗論思想和科學精神。

sentences.english: Light can be trusted to curve only in a vertical plane.
sentences.chinese: 可確信光線僅在垂直面內作曲線傳播。

sentences.english: As a magician, his reputation spread all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個魔術師，他的名聲傳播到了世界各地。

sentences.english: The multi-modes and disperse characteristics of guided waves in steel bar are investigated theoretically and experimentally.
sentences.chinese: 研究了圓柱鋼杆內導波的傳播及其頻散特性。

sentences.english: Epidemic typhus is passed from human to human by the body louse.
sentences.chinese: 流行性斑疹傷寒是由體蝨在人與人之間傳播的。

sentences.english: Which role will propagate to the project models?
sentences.chinese: 哪一個角色將會傳播項目模型？

sentences.english: Generally, WNV is spread by the bite of an infected mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，西尼羅河病毒是由受到感染的蚊子傳播的。

sentences.english: The whistlers propagating along these two different discrete paths have nearly the smae dispersion values.
sentences.chinese: 沿兩條不同路徑傳播的同源哨聲具有幾乎相同的色散。

sentences.english: The development and spread of early western radiochemistry in China was searched through literatures.
sentences.chinese: 研究早期西方放射化學在中國的傳播和發展。

sentences.english: Can a project remain at variance after a harvest or propagation?
sentences.chinese: 項目在獲取或者傳播之後是否能夠保持差異性？
